https://tmrev.io/movie/260541-Dancer Kim's Teaching 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8m1SUZwA8p4pW9QZbOjPb0iNAF3.jpg Love once begun, cannot be stopped. The greatest dancer of all time, Bang (Kim Gi-soo) falls in dangerous love with his student. Detectives misunderstand their relationship and start chasing after them. They run into a mysterious couple in the a guest house they stumble upon while running away from the detectives. They share passionate love in their hideout but even the mysterious owner watches them from afar! Dancer Kim's Teaching
